amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate on significantly reducing child poverty by calendar year 2019.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2846 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2846 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Sanders.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2846 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
